ComicInfo.Summary: Who will be the Final Girl? That's for you to decide! You, the reader, will vote to determine who lives and who dies! From the disturbed mind of David Hutchison (Oz: The Manga, Beowulf) comes this all-new series set in a world of unimaginable horror! 'Final Girl': A slasher film genre term referring to the last person alive to confront the killer. Three young women, Ashley, Heather, and Laurie, mysteriously awaken in a seemingly abandoned, isolated town. They soon encounter the unspeakable terrors the town conceals and are stalked by its horrific inhabitants. As the girls desperately struggle to escape the nightmare the town has become, they must also find a way to put an end to the madness and death unraveling around them. But only one of them will be the Final Girl! Each issue is splattered in Hutchison's gore-drenched, full-color artwork! Coupled with an unhealthy dose of black humor, this is a totally new experience in grueling horror! Issue #5 will feature the thrilling climax, revealing which heroine the Fans have voted to be the Final Girl!
